name: Merge Dogs!
description:
Merge your dogs, build the ultimate dog racing team and win the race!

Do you have what it takes to be the best dog racer out there? Start by getting small puppies, then upgrade them into bigger faster dogs and earn lots of money!

Features:
- Over 50 different dog breeds to discover including shiba inu, corgi, golden retriever, pug, french bulldog, chihuahua, poodle, beagle, dachshund, dalmatian, dobermann, rottweiler and lots more!
- Idle earnings. Gain coins even while you are away or offline.

Manage your team of super fast dogs. Start your dog racing team now and become a champion!
